html:
You will cultivate land
But the land will give no crops
There will be hunger
Hunger you panically frighten
You will see your children and wives dining of hunger
And you will grab the soil and you will start seeking for God
And you will find Him
And He will answer your prayers
You will seek for Messiah
And the Messiah will come
You will worship Him
For ever and ever amen
title: Hunger
